info.title: ComeCome Pay API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for ComeCome Pay backend services including authentication, KYC, wallet operations, cards, coupons, and commission management.

post.description: Login with email and password. OTP will be sent to email.
Verify OTP code and receive access token
User sends a message to admin support

example.message: Hello admin, I need help with my account.

get.description: Get all chat messages for the authenticated user (both sent and received)
Get count of unread messages from admin

put.description: Mark a specific message as read

get.description:
Server-Sent Events (SSE) endpoint for real-time notifications. Keep this connection open to receive new message notifications.

Note: Postman may not display SSE properly. Test with:
- curl: `curl -N -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" http://localhost:8080/api/v1/chat/notifications`
- Browser EventSource API
- Specialized SSE testing tools

post.description: Admin sends a message to a specific user. The user will receive a real-time notification via SSE if connected.

example.message: Hello! How can I help you today?

get.description: Get all chat conversations grouped by user with last message, unread count, and conversation metadata
Get full conversation history with a specific user. Automatically marks user messages as read.

example.title: Virtual Card Ready
example.body: Your virtual card has been created and is ready to use!

post.description: Broadcast a new feature announcement to all users

example.title: New Feature: Instant Transfers
example.body: We've just launched instant transfers! Send money to any user instantly with zero fees for the first month.

post.description: Send promotional notification to VIP users

example.title: Exclusive VIP Offer
example.body: As a valued VIP customer, enjoy 50% off all transaction fees this weekend!

get.description: Get notifications for the authenticated user with pagination
Get the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user

put.description: Mark a specific notification as read by notification ID

get.description: Connect to real-time notification stream via Server-Sent Events (SSE). Note: This endpoint streams data and may not show results in Postman. Use a browser or SSE client instead.

post.description:
Initialize Aliyun KYC verification.

Required fields:
- email (user must exist)
- first_en_name, last_en_name
- id_front_img, id_back_img
- address, city, state, post_code
- area_code, bill_country_code

Response includes certify_id for checking status.

get.description:
Check Aliyun KYC verification status.

Status values:
- not_completed
- rejected
- completed

If email is provided and status is completed, 199 USDT will be deducted from wallet.
Get all Aliyun KYC records for a user (ordered by most recent first)

post.description:
Initialize Didit KYC verification.

Required fields:
- email (user must exist)
- first_en_name, last_en_name
- address, city, state, post_code
- area_code, bill_country_code

Optional:
- agent_uid (defaults to "1")

Note: NO ID images required (unlike Aliyun)

get.description:
Check Didit KYC verification status.

Status values:
- pending
- rejected
- completed

If email is provided and status is completed, 199 USDT will be deducted from wallet.
Get all Didit KYC records for a user (ordered by most recent first)

Public health check endpoint. No authentication required.

**Use Case:** Monitor system availability

Test invalid API key handling.

**Expected:** 401 Unauthorized

Debug endpoint to verify API key and check admin details.

**Authentication:** Required
**Headers:**
- x-api-key: Your API key
- x-tenant-id: (Optional) Your tenant ID

**Use Case:** Verify API key is valid and check admin info

post.description:
Test idempotency protection.

**Instructions:**
1. Run this request TWICE with same idempotency-key
2. Second request should return cached response
3. No duplicate wallet created

**Use Case:** Prevent duplicate transfers/wallets on retry

Derive a new address from HD wallet.

**Features:**
- Atomic index increment (thread-safe)
- Follows BIP44 derivation path
- Optionally fetches balance

**Use Cases:**
- Generate deposit addresses for users
- Separate addresses for different purposes
- Privacy enhancement

**Variables Auto-Set:**
- derivedAddress
- addressIndex

get.description:
List all derived addresses for a wallet.

**Query Parameters:**
- tenant_id (required): Your tenant ID
- fetch_balance (optional): true/false

**Use Cases:**
- View all deposit addresses
- Check balances across addresses
- Audit address usage

parameters.name: fetch_balance
parameters.description: Set to false to skip balance queries (faster)

get.description:
Get details of a specific address by its index.

**Use Cases:**
- Lookup specific address
- Verify address derivation
- Check derivation path

Query balance on Polygon (MATIC).

**Note:** EVM addresses are compatible across ETH, BNB, MATIC, BASE

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: EVM addresses work across ETH, BNB, MATIC, BASE

post.description:
Execute transfer with custom gas settings.

**Use Cases:**
- Speed up transaction (higher gas price)
- Control costs (lower gas price)
- Custom gas limit for complex transactions

**Note:** If not provided, gas is auto-estimated

Execute BNB transfer on BNB Smart Chain.

**Same process as ETH**, just different chain.

get.description:
Get real-time status of a transfer.

**Status Values:**
- `pending`: Created, not yet broadcast
- `broadcast`: Sent to network
- `confirmed`: Mined and confirmed
- `failed`: Transaction failed

**Returns:**
- Current status
- Block number (if mined)
- Confirmations count
- Gas used
- Final fee

**Use Cases:**
- Poll until confirmed
- Display to user
- Audit transactions

List all transfers for a wallet.

**Query Parameters:**
- status (optional): Filter by status

**Use Cases:**
- Transaction history
- Audit trail
- User transaction list

**Results:** Sorted by created_at DESC (newest first)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter: pending, broadcast, confirmed, failed (empty = all)

get.description:
# Complete Chat Flow Example

## Setup
1. Login as user and save access token
2. Login as admin and save admin access token

## User Flow:
1. **Connect to SSE Stream** (keep open in separate terminal):
   ```bash
   curl -N -H "Authorization: Bearer USER_TOKEN" \
   http://localhost:8080/api/v1/chat/notifications
   ```

2. **Send Message to Admin**:
   POST /api/v1/chat/send
   ```json
   {"message": "I need help with my wallet"}
   ```

3. **Check Inbox**:
   GET /api/v1/chat/inbox?page=1&limit=50

4. **Check Unread Count**:
   GET /api/v1/chat/unread

## Admin Flow:
1. **View All Conversations**:
   GET /api/v1/admin/chat/inbox

2. **View Specific User Conversation**:
   GET /api/v1/admin/chat/users/1

3. **Reply to User**:
   POST /api/v1/admin/chat/send
   ```json
   {
     "user_id": 1,
     "message": "I can help you with that!"
   }
   ```

4. **User receives notification via SSE** (real-time)

## User Flow (continued):
5. **Mark Message as Read**:
   PUT /api/v1/chat/messages/MESSAGE_ID/read

6. **View Updated Inbox**:
   GET /api/v1/chat/inbox
